thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Alibaba Affiliate Ant Financial Seeks up to $5 Billion in Funding

author: Chuin-Wei Yap
title: Alibaba Affiliate Ant Financial Seeks up to $5 Billion in Funding
text:
Chinese technology giant Ant Financial Services Group is aiming to raise as much as $5 billion in a new funding round, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that would bolster the companyâ€™s financial position as it weighs a widely anticipated initial public offering.
The Hangzhou-based firm, an affiliate of e-commerce behemoth Alibaba Group Holding Inc., is in talks to pick advisers for the new equity placement, the people familiar said.
